snippet: Friday's better-than-expected jobs report may have sent stock prices higher, but Republicans found the gray lining in that silver cloud.
abstract: Friday's better-than-expected jobs report may have sent stock prices higher, but Republicans found the gray lining in that silver cloud.
lead_paragraph: House Republicans have their message on the economy, and they are sticking to it.

headline.main: House Republicans Find Gray Lining in Brighter Jobs Report
